dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6709 IH: Incentivizing the Expansion of U.S. Ports Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Moylan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To eliminate certain requirements with respect to dredging and dredged material, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Incentivizing the Expansion of U.S. Ports Act.

subsection.text: Section 55109(a)(3) of title 46, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking or is exempt and inserting , is exempt; and
by striking the period at the end and inserting , or is otherwise eligible for such a certificate and endorsement without regard to the requirement under section 12112(a)(2).

subsection.header: Excluding dredged material from transportation requirements

paragraph.text: Section 55110 of title 46, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the section heading, by striking or dredged material; and

paragraph.text: The analysis for chapter 551 of title 46, United States Code, is amended by striking the item relating to section 55110 and inserting the following:
